name: COMBINADO
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot and group manager (Group Help Clone), written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v2 String Session from @COMBINADOASSISTANT_bot on Telegram.

AUTO_GCAST.description: Fill here [True] for on auto gcast/broadcast message, (Leave Blank This Field & skip To Disbale Auto Gcast/Broadcast.)

AUTO_GCAST_MSG.description: Fill here auto broadcast message which will be auto broadcast twice in a day. (any type of message you can copy and paste here)

LOGGER_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Don't Add Channel's ID.
